channel.title: NPC Error

item.title: NPC Error
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

just add a pnpc

if(command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 2){ int npc = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if(npc < 2745){ npcId = npc; npcId2 = npc; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }

item.title: NPC Error
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

Darkning wow you’re an idiot.
That made no sense. If you’re thinking you put the NPC ID 1 for a Man but it goes as the ID before 1 to Hans, as you need to put one higher as 2 for a Man, well yeah if it is, what if he wanted the NPC ID 134 to be 133? Hans isn’t 133, Hans is 0… Ha vi
And if he removed isNPC = True then that would probably cause it to fail.

item.title: NPC Error
item.dc:creator: @Gamerstips Gamerstips
item.description:
@Gamerstips wrote:

I’m using DdsSpeced source, and i made a command to morph you into an NPC, but whenever i do ::gibby, i change into the default NPC, Hans!

Heres my code

if (command.startsWith("gibby") && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 12000) { npcId = 134; isNpc = true; }

Anyone know what i did wrong?

Read full topic
